headline.main: 2 Sides Turn More Heated In Exchanges Over Economy

lead_paragraph: Democrats today intensified their efforts to portray Republicans as more concerned about corporate interests than laid-off workers and to pin blame for the recession on President Bush. Republicans responded with a scathing counterattack, saying Democrats were trying to capitalize politically on the economic effects of the Sept. 11 attacks.
abstract: Congressional Democrats intensify efforts to portray Republicans as more concerned about corporate interests than laid-off workers and to pin blame for recession on Pres Bush; Republicans respond with scathing counterattack, saying Democrats are trying to capitalize politically on economic effects of September 11 terrorist attacks (S)
